You briefly meditate on the nature of your foe and their role in the wider cosmos. Attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Recall Knowledge] about a creature. On a success, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next Strike with a solar weapon against the target this round. If your Strike hits, you can choose which attunement benefit you gain for that strike. The subject of your check is temporarily immune to Meditative Analysis for 1 day.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Meditative Analysis]
